text: Charles Ross Coyle (born March 23, 1937) is a former American football player who played one season with the Los Angeles Rams of the National Football League (NFL). He was drafted by the Rams in the 20th round of the 1959 NFL Draft. He played college football for the Oklahoma Sooners of the University of Oklahoma and attended Marlow High School in Marlow, Oklahoma. Coyle was also a member of the Toronto Argonauts and Calgary Stampeders of the Canadian Football League. ==References== ==External links== *Just Sports Stats *College stats Category:Living people Category:1937 births Category:American football defensive backs Category:American football long snappers Category:Canadian football ends Category:Canadian football defensive backs Category:Canadian football linebackers Category:American players of Canadian football Category:Oklahoma Sooners football players Category:Toronto Argonauts players Category:Calgary Stampeders players Category:Los Angeles Rams players Category:Players of American football from Oklahoma Category:People from Marlow, Oklahoma
title: Ross Coyle
